H3.text: who is shakira married to. Gerard Piqué

A4.text: In June 2022, Shakira and Piqué announced in a joint statement that they were separating.

A5.text: Shakira gave birth to their first son, Milan, on 22 January 2013. She gave birth to their second son, Sasha, on 29 January 2015.
